thread.section_title: Oak Motors Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oak Motors | www.oakmotors.com
thread.title: VICTOR GONZALEZ
thread.title_full: Oak Motors reviewed by VICTOR GONZALEZ

author: VICTOR GONZALEZ
title: VICTOR GONZALEZ
text: The entire experience with Oak Motors was great. Still, I had my heart set on a mid size SUV that me and my sales person went over, yet land up not qualifying due to my wages! I did have to make a trip from Lafayette twice in a uhaul, due to financing requesting that I first produce a Indiana identification card, and I have a valid Illinois license. Nevertheless, the experience was definitely time consuming, and worth it! We would have loved to get the vehicle that we sorta signed for during our pre qualification process, yet we appreciate that my brother in law introduced us to Oak motors.
